events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and request a refund for the purchase.
The system has categorised the customer's issue under refund due to their request to return the jacket and get money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket order.
Hello! Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, could you confirm if the jacket has been sent back to our return address?
Yes, I dropped it off at the post office two days ago and the tracking number is available if needed.
Thank you for the info. We will verify receipt and process your refund within five business days.
Great, I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the refund in my account.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received correctly and if you need any further assistance.
Closing this case as the refund was successfully issued and no further actions are required.
We have sent a short survey about your refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
